original_text: They said to him, “Why then did Moses command one to give a certificate of divorce and to send her away?”
korean_text: 여짜오되 그러면 어찌하여 모세는 이혼 증서를 주어서 버리라 명하였나이까

sentences.original_text: “Why then did Moses command one to give a certificate of divorce
sentences.korean_translation: “그러면 어찌하여 모세가 이혼 증서를 써 주라고 명령했습니까
